scripts.dev: concurrently "cd apps/web && npm run dev" "cd apps/api && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n web,api,seo-view,seo-worker -c green,cyan,magenta,yellow "cd apps/web && npm run dev" "cd apps/api && npm run dev" "cd seo-ecommerce/view && npm run dev" "cd seo-ecommerce/server && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:windows: concurrently -n web,api,seo-view,seo-worker -c green,cyan,magenta,yellow "powershell -Command 'cd apps/web; npm run dev'" "powershell -Command 'cd apps/api; npm run dev'" "powershell -Command 'cd seo-ecommerce/view; npm run dev'" "powershell -Command 'cd seo-ecommerce/server; npm run dev'"
scripts.dev:all:no-api: concurrently -n web,seo-view,seo-worker -c green,magenta,yellow "cd apps/web && npm run dev" "cd seo-ecommerce/view && npm run dev" "cd seo-ecommerce/server && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:seo: concurrently -n seo-view,seo-worker -c magenta,yellow "cd seo-ecommerce/view && npm run dev" "cd seo-ecommerce/server && npm run dev"
scripts.deploy:seo: set -e; cd seo-ecommerce/view; npm run build; cd ../server; npm run gen; npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:seo:fast: cd seo-ecommerce/view && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run deploy
scripts.release:seo: git add . && git commit -m 'chore: release new version' && git push && npm run deploy:seo
scripts.clean: rm -f deno.lock package-lock.json bun.lock && rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules
scripts.db:types: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id ozksgdmyrqcxcwhnbepg --schema public > packages/sdk/src/storage/supabase/schema.ts
